testcase.name: forgot password
testcase.system-out: Given user try to login with the valid username "Pramodvgwd600@gmail.com" and invalid Password "Pramod".passed Then user should be able to redirected to the appropriate page when clicking on Forgot Password link.passed And navigate to Gmail with the new window and refresh the mails.............passed And select the proper mail with the title Rahul Shetty having a current date and fetch the OTP.passed Then redirect to Rahul Sheety academy and click on submit by giving valid OTP.passed And By giving the new password and Confirm Password user must able to login.passed
